```{r setup, include=FALSE}
install.packages("leaflet")
install.packages("ggplot2")

library(leaflet)
library(ggplot2)
```
```{r}
herpcover <- read.csv("./Data/coverboardwrangling.csv")
```
```{r}
CoverBoards <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(data = herpcover, lng = ~Long, lat = ~Lat)
CoverBoards
```
